AbstractUIHandler, javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener, java.awt.MenuContainer, PacksPanelInterface, java.io.Serializable
public class PacksPanel
extends PacksPanelBase

The packs selection panel class. This class handles only the layout. Common stuff are handled by the base class.

Author:
Julien Ponge, Jan Blok, Klaus Bartz
